ComicInfo.Series: DCeased: War of the Undead Gods
ComicInfo.Summary: Adam Strange becomes infected by the virus and spreads it to Rann and Thanagar. Lobo is confronted by infected Thanagarians. On Themyscira at Diana's funeral, Ares arrives with a warning about a threat that will end the universe, while the Guardians of the Universe summon the Green Lantern Corps to Oa to face the coming threat.
